channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Government Data Show Surge in People Smoking at Work
item.description: A survey by Taiwan's health ministry says 30% of men and 4.6% of women smoke at work, leading to 28% of people being exposed to second-hand smoke at the office. Doctors and activis

item.title: Taiwan Civil Groups Call for Divestment From Israel; Aid for Palestine
item.description: Dozens of civil society groups across various sectors in Taiwan have formed a coalition demanding the country end its arms deals with Israel and send humanitarian aid to Palestine.

item.title: Hualien Warns Residents of Cheap Real Estate Scams After Massive Earthquake
item.description: Hualien officials are warning earthquake victims to be wary of real estate scams as people have been trying to buy up damaged properties on the cheap.

item.title: China Coast Guard Ships Attack Philippine Resupply Ships Amid Major Drills
item.description: Chinese coast guard ships have once again fired water cannons at Philippine vessels on a resupply mission in the South China Sea. The attack comes as the United States and the Phil
